message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll take advantage of it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'd be willing to pay $8,000 for it. What do you say?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,500. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
I appreciate you meeting me a bit, Alice.  How about $9,500?  That's the highest I can go.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as high as $9,500. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $10,250. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
